title: A Knight’s Tale Is Finally Getting A 4K Blu-Ray Release
description: A Knight’s Tale 4K Steelbook $56 | Releases May 20 Preorder at Amazon Though it launched to mixed reviews in 2001, A Knight’s Tale has become something of a cult classic over the years, and soon fans can add the film to their 4K Blu-ray collection with the upcoming A Knight’s Tale 4K Steelbook edition. Preorders are now open ahead of its May 20 release, and along with a premium steelbook, it’s packed with never-before-seen features. A Knight’s Tale 4K Steelbook $56 | Releases May 20 A Knight's Tale 4K Steelbook features both a 4K and standard Blu-ray format of the film. The 4K version supports Dolby Vision HDR and Dolby Atmos surround sound. Both discs come in a gorgeous steelbook case.Though it's currently listed for $56, the price will likely drop ahead of launch. Preordering at Amazon means you won't pay until the item ships, and you'll be eligible for any price cuts between now and release. There's also some behind-the-scenes commentary and bonus content from previous releases. It’s a hilarious movie that's held up well over the years. html:
GameSpot may receive revenue from affiliate and advertising partnerships for sharing this content and from purchases through links.

Though it launched to mixed reviews in 2001, A Knight’s Tale has become something of a cult classic over the years, and soon fans can add the film to their 4K Blu-ray collection with the upcoming A Knight’s Tale 4K Steelbook edition. Preorders are now open ahead of its May 20 release, and along with a premium steelbook, it’s packed with never-before-seen features.

A Knight’s Tale 4K Steelbook

$56 | Releases May 20

A Knight's Tale 4K Steelbook features both a 4K and standard Blu-ray format of the film. The 4K version supports Dolby Vision HDR and Dolby Atmos surround sound. Both discs come in a gorgeous steelbook case.

Though it's currently listed for $56, the price will likely drop ahead of launch. Preordering at Amazon means you won't pay until the item ships, and you'll be eligible for any price cuts between now and release.

A Knight's Tale 4K Steelbook Bonus Features

This new A Knight's Tale 4K Steelbook Edition includes five never-before-seen deleted and extended scenes, an all-new gag reel, and a featurette Quill and Quarterhorse: 2nd Unit Photography. There's also some behind-the-scenes commentary and bonus content from previous releases. Note that the special features are presented in 1080p definition.

  • 5 deleted and extended scenes (New)
  • Gag reel (New)
  • Quill and Quarterhorse: 2nd Unit Photography (New)
  • Commentary with director Brian Helgeland and actor Paul Bettany
  • 11 behind-the-scenes featurettes
  • 6 deleted scenes
  • HBO Making-of Special
  • Music video
  • Trailers and TV ads

A Knight's Tale is a comedy starring Heath Ledger, who plays a lowly squire posing as a knight to win fame and fortune. It’s a hilarious movie that's held up well over the years. This is the first time the movie will be available in 4K, though there's also a $7 standard Blu-ray version available at Amazon.

For more 4K Blu-ray deals, check out this massive deal on Paramount 4K Blu-rays, or take a peek at our roundup of every Pixar movie available on 4K Blu-ray to see if there's anything you're missing.
